Plain English Live Streaming Exec Traces
01 — Plain Language

Write tests in
plain English

No page objects. No selectors. Describe what you want to test and the AI agent figures out the rest — tap targets, scroll positions, assertions.

Read the docs ↗ Try it free →
02 — Live Streaming

Watch devices
run live

WebRTC-powered device streaming at 24–30fps. See every tap, scroll, and assertion play out in real time — from anywhere in the world.

Start streaming ↗ Try it free →
03 — Execution Traces

Know exactly
what went wrong

Video clips of every action. Step-by-step traces with timestamps, screenshots at each step, and one-click shareable failure reports.

View sample report ↗ Try it free →

Built for speed and scale

Optimized for the tight loop an AI agent needs: capture the screen, ground the instruction, execute the action, verify the result.
